definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)

sentences.english: He still bears the scars on the back of his head.
sentences.chinese: 他的后脑勺上依然有着当时留下的伤疤。

sentences.english: He lay back and put his hands behind his head.
sentences.chinese: 他躺了下去，用双手垫着后脑勺。

sentences.english: This can cause lower jaw pains as well as muscle pains in the back of the head.
sentences.chinese: 这会引发下颌痛和后脑勺肌肉痛。

sentences.english: Run your fingers through their hair and gently caress the back of the head.
sentences.chinese: 你的手指滑过他们的头发，温柔地抚摸后脑勺。

sentences.english: He began shaving an Apple logo into the back of his head.
sentences.chinese: 他开始在后脑勺剃出有苹果标识的发型。

sentences.english: I think it's in your brain, the back of your head.
sentences.chinese: 应该是在大脑中，后脑勺那里。

sentences.english: It hit the president in the upper right rear of his head, and blood was everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 它击中了总统的后脑勺的右上方，血溅四处。

sentences.english: The back of my head throbbed, as usual, when I remembered that money.
sentences.chinese: 我的后脑勺一如往常我想到那些钱般抽痛。

sentences.english: The back of your head keeps getting hit by the toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里的马桶盖打到你的后脑勺了。
二十个剃的光光的后脑勺。

sentences.english: Cup some water in your hand and pretend to sneeze on the back of someone’s head.
sentences.chinese: 舀点水在手心里，对着别人的后脑勺假装打喷嚏。

sentences.english: Was rich to greatly applaud to clap her behind portion of skull, little Cu eyebrow, presently resume original variety.
sentences.chinese: 富大拍了拍她的后脑勺，微微蹙眉，很快就恢复原样。

sentences.english: They must have another hollow-point ready for the back of your head.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定也给你的后脑勺准备了另一个子弹孔。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
temple (on the sides of human head)
